# Supplementary Figures

```{r}
#| label: fig-consort-nsclc
#| fig-cap: "CONSORT diagram for non-small cell lung cancer (NSCLC) top candidate trials."
#| out-width: "115%"

include_graphics(here("figures", "consort_nsclc.png"))
```

*Note that @fig-consort-nsclc results in four shortlisted candidates because both CheckMate017/057 have been both shortlisted and only differ in the squamous versus nonsquamous histological eligibility of the trial population.*
